author: The Vegetarian Society
method: Mix the pear concentrate with the sparkling water. Add the cranberry juice and chill well. Just before serving, add the chopped pear, and garnish with fresh mint leaves.
ingredients: 6 tbsp pear concentrate,  1 litre/1¾ pint sparkling water,  1 litre/1¾ pint cranberry juice,  1 medium pear, cut into 1cm/½in pieces,  sprigs of fresh mint
